overview: In this animated Christmas tale, young Dylan Taylor just aches for the XR-7 Speedster -- a shiny titanium bike that his parents simply can't afford. But when Dylan learns the bike is the grand prize in a Christmas decorating contest, he gets to work. Soon, he finds himself in a fierce competition against his neighbor to transform his yard into a spectacular winter wonderland that would put a gleam even in Santa's eye.
title: Adventures in Odyssey: Electric Christmas
